name: LayoutPref
questionText:
Please comment on your experience of using the two different visual techniques (split view vs combined view).
Which of the two interfaces did you prefer over all? (please give your reasons)
Which of the two interfaces was easier to use? (please give your reasons)
Did the different techniques help you make different types of discoveries about the data?
Do you have any other comments about your experience of using the two visual techniques?
